response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value for us, but considering its importance to you, we believe it's a perfect match. We're offering it to you at a special price of $14,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive rate, tailored specifically to meet your needs. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and bring you immense satisfaction. Please let us know if this offer suits your budget and preferences.", "product_price": 14000}
